question:

is taken out.

option_2: Energy \( \varepsilon^{2} C_{0}(K-1) \) is absorbed by the cell.
option_3: The energy stored in the capacitor is reduced by \( \varepsilon^{2} C_{0}(K-1) \)
option_4: The external agent has to do \( \frac{1}{2} \varepsilon^{2} C_{0}(K-1) \) amount of work to take the slab out.
Subject: Physics
correct_answer: Charge \( \varepsilon C_{0}(K-1) \) flows through the cell
